TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ElementHost extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializer("WindowsFormsIntegration.Design.ElementHostCodeDomSerializer, WindowsFormsIntegration.Design, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer, System.Design, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 可用于托管 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 元素的 Windows 窗体控件。

span.span: A Windows Forms control that can be used to host a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用控件放置[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]上你[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]控件或窗体。Use the control to place a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] on your [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control or form. 到主机[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]中控制[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]元素，而使用元素。To host a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, use the element. > [!NOTE] > 使用安装 WindowsFormsIntegration.dll[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]程序集。WindowsFormsIntegration.dll is installed with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] assemblies. 程序集的默认位置是 %programfiles%\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\v3.0\WindowsFormsIntegration.dll。The default location for the assembly is %programfiles%\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\v3.0\WindowsFormsIntegration.dll. 到主机[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]Windows 窗体中的元素，你必须分配[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]元素属性。To host a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element in a Windows Form, you must assign the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element to the property. 使用要分配之间的自定义映射属性控制和其托管[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]元素。Use the property to assign custom mappings between an control and its hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 窗体和 WPF 属性映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md)。For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件来承载[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to host a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element. 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 承载 Windows 窗体中三维 WPF 复合控件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting a 3-D WPF Composite Control in Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md). [!code-csharp[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/CSharp/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/VisualBasic/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.vb#11)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否自动调整控件的大小以显示其完整内容。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is automatically resized to display its entire contents.

value.span: 如果控件调整其大小以充分适合其内容，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control adjusts its size to closely fit its contents; otherwise, .
The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool BackColorTransparent { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置指示所承载的元素是否具有透明背景的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the hosted element has a transparent background.

value.span: 如果承载的元素具有透明背景，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the hosted element has a transparent background; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使复制位图，这使得承载的元素，若要通过主机容器使用透明度。The property enables bitmap copying, which enables hosted elements to use transparency over the host container. 为图像或渐变背景元素时，这非常有用。This is useful when the element is over an image or gradient background. 出于性能原因，属性默认情况下处于关闭状态。For performance reasons, the property is turned off by default.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::UIElement ^ Child { System::Windows::UIElement ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::UIElement ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置由 控件承载的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the hosted by the control.
The hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以承载仅有一个元素，但可以具有任意数量的子元素。Only one element can be hosted, but can have any number of child elements. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性分配一个承载[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to assign a hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element. 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 承载 Windows 窗体中三维 WPF 复合控件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting a 3-D WPF Composite Control in Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md). [!code-csharp[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/CSharp/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/VisualBasic/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 立即释放 控件使用的所有系统资源。

span.span: Immediately frees any system resources used by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在重写请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void EnableModelessKeyboardInterop(class System.Windows.Window window) cil managed

param.name: window
param.span: 要以无模式方式打开的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 窗口。

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] window to be opened modelessly.

summary.span: 使 在从 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]中以无模式方式打开时能正确地接收键盘消息。

span.span: Enables a to receive keyboard messages correctly when it is opened modelessly from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法转发所有键盘消息时[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]打开。Call the method to forward all keyboard messages when a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] window is opened modelessly. 方法安装中的消息筛选器[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-基于应用程序。The method installs a message filter in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based application. 无模式窗口处于活动状态时，此筛选器将转发所有键盘消息。The filter forwards all keyboard messages when the modeless window is active.

permission.span: 表示调用堆栈中所有高级调用方完全信任。

span.span: for full trust for all callers higher in the call stack.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HostContainer As Panel
public: property System::Windows::Controls::Panel ^ HostContainer { System::Windows::Controls::Panel ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取承载的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 元素的父容器。

span.span: Gets the parent container of the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
The parent container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 宿主容器是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] ，这是承载的元素的父容器。The host container is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] , which is the parent container for the hosted element. 宿主容器是始终根目录下的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]元素层次结构。The host container is always at the root of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element hierarchy. 若要访问承载的元素的父级，访问直接。To access the parent of the hosted element, access directly.

in all cases.

Protected Overrides Sub OnEnabledChanged (e As EventArgs)

span.span: The data for the event.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: Do not override this implementation of the method.

span.span: The control manages the painting of its hosted element, and overriding will cause unpredictable results.

span.span: A that contains information about the control to paint.

summary.span: 绘制控件的背景。

span.span: Paints the background of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法绘制到屏幕外 HBITMAP 父控件的背景。The method paints the parent control's background into an offscreen HBITMAP. 此位图中承载的元素的背景为用于支持透明度。This bitmap is used as the background in the hosted element to support transparency. 此方法支持 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] 基础结构，不能在代码中直接使用。This method supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override bool ProcessCmdKey (ref System.Windows.Forms.Message msg, System.Windows.Forms.Keys keyData);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool ProcessCmdKey(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Message& msg, valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Keys keyData) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function ProcessCmdKey (ByRef msg As Message, keyData As Keys) As Boolean
protected: override bool ProcessCmdKey(System::Windows::Forms::Message % msg, System::Windows::Forms::Keys keyData);

param.name: msg
param.span: 通过引用传递的 ，表示要处理的窗口消息。

span.span: A , passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.

param.name: keyData
param.span: 值之一，表示要处理的键。

span.span: One of the values representing the key to process.

summary.span: 处理命令键，确保承载的元素在进行正常的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]处理之前有机会处理命令。

span.span: Processes a command key, ensuring that the hosted element has an opportunity to handle the command before normal [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] processing.

returns.span: 如果该字符是 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 快捷键，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the character is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] shortcut key; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不处理键消息所承载的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]元素，它转发向上[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]类层次结构进行处理。If a key message is not handled by the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, it is forwarded up the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] class hierarchy for processing.

permission.span: 直接调用方的完全信任。

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.

Protected Overrides Function ProcessMnemonic (charCode As Char) As Boolean

span.span: The character to process.

summary.span: 处理助记键字符，从而确保承载的元素在进行正常的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]处理之前有机会处理助记键。

span.span: Processes a mnemonic character, ensuring that the hosted element has an opportunity to handle the mnemonic before normal [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] processing.

returns.span: 如果该字符是 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 快捷键，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the character is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] shortcut key; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不处理键消息所承载的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]元素，它转发向上[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]类层次结构进行处理。If a key message is not handled by the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, it is forwarded up the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] class hierarchy for processing.

permission.span: 直接调用方的完全信任。

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PropertyMap As PropertyMap

summary.span: 获取属性映射，属性映射决定了设置 控件的属性会对承载的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 元素产生何种影响。

span.span: Gets the property map, which determines how setting properties on the control affects the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

value.span: 一个 ，它将 映射到所承载 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 元素的属性。

span.span: A that maps to properties on the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]技术具有两个相似但不同属性模型。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies have two similar but different property models. *属性映射*支持两种体系结构之间进行互操作。*Property mapping* supports interoperation between the two architectures. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 窗体和 WPF 属性映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md)。For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来转换属性一个承载的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to translate the property for a hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element. 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 使用 ElementHost 控件映射属性](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-mapping-properties-using-the-elementhost-control.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Mapping Properties Using the ElementHost Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-mapping-properties-using-the-elementhost-control.md). [!code-csharp[PropertyMappingWithElementHost#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/CSharp/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/Form1.cs#12)] [!code-vb[PropertyMappingWithElementHost#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/VisualBasic/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/Form1.vb#12)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Select (bool directed, bool forward);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Select(bool directed, bool forward) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Select (directed As Boolean, forward As Boolean)
protected: override void Select(bool directed, bool forward);

param.name: directed
param.span: 如果指定要选择的控件的方向，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to specify the direction of the control to select; otherwise, .

param.name: forward
param.span: 如果为 则在 Tab 键顺序中前移；如果为 则在 Tab 键顺序中后移。

span.span: to move forward in the tab order; to move backward in the tab order.

summary.span: 激活承载的元素。

span.span: Activates the hosted element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法激活所承载的元素。The method activates the hosted element. 如果存在多个承载的元素，激活的第一个或最后一个元素，具体取决于`directed`和`forward`参数。If more than one hosted element exists, either the first or last element is activated, depending on the `directed` and `forward` parameters. 重复调用方法不会遍历承载的元素。Repeated calls to the method do not traverse the hosted elements. 若要选择后续元素，调用方法属性。To select subsequent elements, call the method on the property. 此实现的 tab 键转发[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]到[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]。This implementation forwards tab keys from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)].
